jcurses.widgets

Class BorderPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • jcurses.widgets.Widget
      • jcurses.widgets.WidgetContainer
        • jcurses.widgets.Panel
          • jcurses.widgets.BorderPanel

  • public class BorderPanel
extends Panel
    This class implements a panel with a border.
